LightningComponentBundle.description: Reusable component to display "Acontecendo Agora" (Happening Now) indicator for events currently in progress

property.name: startDateTime
property.label: Start Date/Time
property.description: Event start date and time (ISO format)

property.name: endDateTime
property.label: End Date/Time
property.description: Event end date and time (ISO format)

property.name: customText
property.label: Custom Text
property.description: Custom text to display (default: Acontecendo Agora)

property.name: showAnimation
property.label: Show Animation
property.description: Whether to show pulse animation (default: true)

property.name: useServerValidation
property.label: Use Server Validation
property.description: Whether to use server-side validation for timezone accuracy
